tools.name: DeepChat
tools.description: A powerful cross-platform desktop AI assistant that integrates with DeepSeek's large language models.

tools.name: Quantalogic
tools.description: A ReAct framework for building advanced AI agents.

tools.name: Chatbox
tools.description: A desktop client for multiple cutting-edge LLM models.

tools.name: NextChat
tools.description: A lightweight, fast, and highly customizable AI assistant web application with native DeepSeek integration, featuring cross-platform support through PWA technology, specific UI optimizations for DeepSeek Reasoner model, multi-model support, and MCP (multi-agent collaboration protocol) capabilities for enhanced AI interactions.

tools.name: Coco AI
tools.description: A fully open-source, cross-platform unified search and productivity suite that seamlessly integrates with DeepSeek AI for enhanced knowledge management, connecting multiple data sources including applications, files, cloud services, and collaboration platforms into a powerful, privacy-focused interface with intelligent document understanding and contextual retrieval capabilities.

tools.name: Liubai
tools.description: An intelligent WeChat-based knowledge management system powered by DeepSeek AI that enables seamless organization of notes, tasks, calendars, and to-do lists directly within the WeChat ecosystem, providing AI-enhanced content categorization, summarization, and analysis through intuitive tag-based classification for improved personal productivity.

tools.name: Pal
tools.description: A feature-rich, privacy-focused iOS AI chat client that supports multiple language models including DeepSeek, offering a customizable chat playground with system message management, conversation history, markdown rendering, syntax highlighting, image processing capabilities, and Siri Shortcuts integration for enhanced mobile productivity.

tools.name: LibreChat
tools.description: An all-in-one open-source chat platform with native DeepSeek integration, featuring AI agents, code interpreter capabilities, multimodal interactions, conversation management tools, custom presets, file handling, and cross-provider support including OpenAI, Claude, and AWS Bedrock models for a complete and flexible AI conversation experience.

tools.name: Lobe Chat
tools.description: A highly-rated open-source AI chat framework with elegant UI design that supports seamless DeepSeek integration, featuring advanced knowledge base management with RAG capabilities, multi-modal interactions (vision, TTS, STT), extensive plugin system with function calling, custom agent creation, and one-click deployment options for private chat applications with robust privacy protection.

tools.name: PapersGPT
tools.description: A powerful Zotero plugin for academic research that seamlessly integrates with DeepSeek R1 and DeepSeek V3 models, allowing researchers to chat with PDF papers, extract insights, generate summaries, and enhance reading efficiency with privacy-first design that keeps all data stored locally, supporting multiple premium and free AI models for comprehensive academic document analysis.

tools.name: DeepSeek Coder
tools.description: A comprehensive suite of state-of-the-art AI coding models trained on 2 trillion tokens across 80+ programming languages, available in multiple sizes (1.3B to 33B) with a 16K context window for project-level code understanding, offering superior capabilities in code generation, completion, infilling, and error fixing with MIT license for both research and commercial use.

tools.name: RSS Translator
tools.description: An innovative tool powered by DeepSeek AI that automatically translates RSS feeds from various sources into your preferred language, enabling seamless access to international content, news, and publications with high-quality translations that preserve the original meaning and context, ideal for staying informed about global developments without language barriers.

tools.name: Enconvo
tools.description: A revolutionary AI Launcher for macOS that integrates DeepSeek R1 and V3 models, featuring 150+ built-in tools and MCP support to transform productivity with SmartBar unified entry, knowledge base management, customizable PopBar tools, intelligent context awareness, voice input methods, document chat capabilities, and advanced AI agent functionality for seamless workflow automation across your entire system.

tools.name: Cherry Studio
tools.description: A versatile cross-platform desktop client that seamlessly integrates DeepSeek models alongside other LLM providers, offering 300+ pre-configured AI assistants, multi-model simultaneous conversations, comprehensive document processing (text, images, Office, PDF), practical tools integration including global search and AI translation, WebDAV file management and backup, complete markdown rendering, and an intuitive interface with light/dark themes for enhanced productivity.

tools.name: ToMemo
tools.description: A powerful iOS productivity app that combines intelligent sticky notes, adaptive short-term memory, and keyboard enhancement with DeepSeek AI integration, featuring dynamic filtering rules, text preprocessing, clipboard history management, custom keyboard skins, iCloud sync, widget support, and AI macromodeling capabilities for rapid content creation and efficient information management across all your Apple devices.

tools.name: Video Subtitle Master
tools.description: A comprehensive cross-platform desktop application for batch generating and translating video subtitles, featuring DeepSeek API integration alongside multiple translation services (Baidu, Volcano Engine, DeepLX, Ollama), optimized speech recognition with whisper.cpp and Core ML acceleration on Apple Silicon, customizable subtitle formatting, flexible naming conventions, concurrent task processing, and seamless workflow from video processing to subtitle generation and translation.

tools.name: Chatworm
tools.description: A versatile open-source AI chat application available as both a web platform and Android app, featuring comprehensive integration with multiple language models including DeepSeek, advanced conversation management with organization and search capabilities, sophisticated file handling supporting diverse document types for AI analysis, privacy-focused design with end-to-end encryption, and cross-platform synchronization that maintains conversation history and preferences across all devices.

tools.name: Easydict
tools.description: A comprehensive macOS translation and dictionary application that seamlessly integrates with DeepSeek and multiple AI language models, featuring automatic language recognition, multi-service simultaneous lookup, selection-based translation, OCR screenshot capabilities, custom dictionary support, Apple System Dictionary integration, TTS functionality, multi-window configuration options, and support for 48 languages, all presented through an elegant and intuitive interface that prioritizes ease of use and productivity.

tools.name: Raycast
tools.description: A powerful productivity launcher for macOS that enhances your workflow with AI integration, including DeepSeek models, offering features like customizable chat presets, OS-level automation through AI Commands, natural language interaction with applications, multi-model comparison, file attachments support, clipboard history management, window management, snippets, quicklinks, and an extensive Extension Store with community-created tools, all accessible through a sleek interface designed to streamline daily tasks with minimal keystrokes.

tools.name: Nice Prompt
tools.description: An advanced prompt engineering and management platform optimized for DeepSeek models that enables users to create, test, refine, and share AI prompts through an intuitive interface, featuring collaborative workspaces with version control, side-by-side prompt comparison testing, comprehensive analytics for performance insights, customizable templates with variable management, and enterprise-ready governance capabilities, all designed to systematically improve AI response quality while optimizing resource usage.

tools.name: PHP Client
tools.description: A robust and community-driven PHP client library for seamless integration with the DeepSeek API, featuring comprehensive API coverage, modern PHP 8.x architecture, fluent interface design, framework integrations (Laravel, Symfony, WordPress), enterprise-ready security and reliability features, streaming response handling, and extensive documentation, enabling PHP developers to easily incorporate DeepSeek's AI capabilities into web applications and enterprise solutions.

tools.name: DeepSwiftSeek
tools.description: A comprehensive Swift package that provides native integration with DeepSeek AI models for Apple platforms, featuring modern Swift concurrency support, SwiftUI integration, advanced streaming capabilities, platform-specific optimizations for battery and memory efficiency, enterprise-grade security features, and complete access to DeepSeek's model lineup through an intuitive Swift API, enabling developers to create sophisticated AI-powered experiences for iOS, macOS, watchOS, and tvOS applications.

tools.name: Laravel Integration
tools.description: A comprehensive Laravel package that seamlessly integrates DeepSeek AI capabilities into Laravel applications, featuring framework-native implementation with service providers, facades, middleware, and Artisan commands, plus specialized services for content generation, intelligent search, form processing, and developer productivity tools, all following Laravel conventions for minimal learning curve and maximum compatibility with existing projects.

tools.name: Zotero
tools.description: A powerful reference management software integrated with DeepSeek AI technology, providing intelligent literature analysis, annotation assistance, automated metadata extraction, and natural language querying capabilities for academic research. The DeepSeek integration enables deep analysis of PDF literature, identifying key arguments, research methods, and findings, generating summaries and insights, helping researchers establish connections between multiple publications and identify research gaps. Supports team collaboration features, allowing research groups to share AI-assisted annotations and insights while maintaining strict privacy controls and data protection, suitable for academic research, policy analysis, and interdisciplinary research scenarios.

tools.name: SiYuan
tools.description: A privacy-first personal knowledge management system with native DeepSeek AI integration, enabling powerful knowledge organization through block-level document structure, bi-directional linking, and a local-first architecture. DeepSeek AI-enhanced features include intelligent content analysis, relationship discovery, automatic summarization, and natural language querying, providing AI assistance while maintaining complete data ownership. Supports various content formats including text, code, mathematical formulas, and multimedia, suitable for academic research, lifelong learning, content creation, and project management scenarios.

tools.name: go-stock
tools.description: A sophisticated Chinese stock market analysis platform built with Wails and NativeUI that integrates DeepSeek's language models for intelligent market insights, featuring real-time data visualization, automated technical analysis, natural language interactions for market queries, personalized investment strategy recommendations, advanced pattern recognition, and comprehensive portfolio management tools—all presented through an elegant, responsive interface for both professional traders and retail investors.

tools.name: Wordware
tools.description: A comprehensive AI development toolkit that enables both technical and non-technical users to build, iterate, and deploy sophisticated AI applications using natural language programming, featuring native DeepSeek V3 and R1 model integration through an intuitive interface, advanced control blocks for complex workflows, tool integration capabilities, customizable templates, and seamless deployment options—all designed to democratize AI development without requiring coding expertise.

tools.name: Dify
tools.description: An open-source LLMOps platform for building sophisticated AI applications with native DeepSeek integration, featuring visual workflow design, advanced RAG capabilities with knowledge base management, drag-and-drop function nodes, multi-model orchestration supporting DeepSeek R1 and V3, comprehensive analytics dashboards, and both cloud and private deployment options that ensure data sovereignty—ideal for creating intelligent chatbots, workflow automation systems, and enterprise-grade AI solutions without extensive coding.

tools.name: Big-AGI
tools.description: An open-source AI platform with native DeepSeek model integration, offering multi-model access, multi-agent collaboration, knowledge management, data visualization, and workflow automation through a unified intuitive interface, enabling users to easily build complex AI applications. Supports flexible deployment options including cloud, local, and hybrid implementations, ensuring enterprise-grade security and data sovereignty, suitable for research, education, content creation, and enterprise knowledge management scenarios.

tools.name: LiberSonora
tools.description: An AI-powered, robust, open-source audiobook toolkit that includes features like intelligent subtitle extraction, AI title generation, multilingual translation, with support for GPU acceleration and batch offline processing.

tools.name: Bob
tools.description: A macOS translation & OCR tool ready to use in any app — with DeepSeek integration via plugins

tools.name: AgenticFlow
tools.description: A no-code platform where marketers build agentic AI workflows for go-to-market automation, powered by hundreds of everyday apps as tools for your AI agents.

tools.name: STranslate
tools.description: A ready-to-go translation OCR tool developed by WPF for Windows with DeepSeek integration.

tools.name: ASP Client
tools.description: A lightweight ASP.NET wrapper for the Deepseek AI API, designed to simplify AI-driven text processing in .NET applications.

tools.name: GPT AI Flow
tools.description: The ultimate productivity weapon built by engineers for efficiency enthusiasts, with features like desktop intelligent hub, local encrypted storage, and custom instruction engine.

tools.name: Story-Flicks
tools.description: With just one sentence, you can quickly generate high-definition story short videos, supporting models such as DeepSeek.

tools.name: 16x Prompt
tools.description: An AI coding tool with context management. It helps developers manage source code context and craft prompts for complex coding tasks on existing codebases.

tools.name: Alpha Pai
tools.description: AI Research Assistant / The Next-Generation Financial Information Portal Driven by AI. Proxy for investors to attend meetings and take notes, as well as providing search and Q&A services for financial information and quantitative analysis for investment research.

tools.name: argo
tools.description: Locally download and run Ollama and Huggingface models with RAG on Mac/Windows/Linux. Support LLM API too.

tools.name: PeterCat
tools.description: A conversational Q&A agent configuration system, self-hosted deployment solutions, and a convenient all-in-one application SDK, allowing you to create intelligent Q&A bots for your GitHub repositories.

tools.name: FastGPT
tools.description: An open-source knowledge base Q&A and RAG platform with deep DeepSeek model integration, featuring an intuitive visual workflow designer for no-code AI application development. It offers powerful knowledge management capabilities supporting multiple document formats, databases, and web content processing and retrieval, with optimized parameter configurations and connectors for DeepSeek models. Enterprise-grade deployment options include cloud-hosted SaaS, private cloud, and on-premises deployment to meet data sovereignty requirements, suitable for customer support, enterprise knowledge management, research assistance, and vertical industry applications.

tools.name: RuZhi AI Notes
tools.description: RuZhi AI Notes is an intelligent knowledge management tool powered by AI, providing one-stop knowledge management and application services including AI search & exploration, AI results to notes conversion, note management & organization, knowledge presentation & sharing. Integrated with DeepSeek model to provide more stable and higher quality outputs.

tools.name: Chatgpt-on-Wechat
tools.description: Chatgpt-on-Wechat(CoW) is a flexible chatbot framework that supports seamless integration of multiple LLMs, including DeepSeek, OpenAI, Claude, Qwen, and others, into commonly used platforms or office software such as WeChat Official Accounts, WeCom, Feishu, DingTalk, and websites. It also supports a wide range of custom plugins.

tools.name: Athena
tools.description: The world's first autonomous general AI with advanced cognitive architecture and human-like reasoning capabilities, designed to tackle complex real-world challenges.

tools.name: MaxKB
tools.description: MaxKB is a ready-to-use, flexible RAG Chatbot.

tools.name: TigerGPT
tools.description: TigerGPT is the first financial AI investment assistant of its kind based on OpenAI, developed by Tiger Group. TigerGPT aims to provide intelligent investment decision-making support for investors. On February 18, 2025, TigerGPT officially integrated the DeepSeek-R1 model to provide users with online Q&A services that support deep reasoning.

tools.name: HIX.AI
tools.description: Try DeepSeek for free and enjoy unlimited AI chat on HIX.AI. Use DeepSeek R1 for AI chat, writing, coding & more. Experience next-gen AI chat now!
